snippet: Dianuris Ortiz, a college student who spent four years in foster care, was inspired by her mother, who “had respect for herself.”
abstract: Children's Aid Society, one of seven beneficiary agencies of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps full-time student and former foster youth Dianuris Ortiz of Manhattan pay for rent and clothing.
lead_paragraph: Dianuris Ortiz, a college student who spent four years in foster care, was inspired by her mother, who “had respect for herself.”

headline.seo: A Drive for Education From a Mother Who Insisted
headline.main: A Drive for Education From an Inspiring Mother
headline.print_headline: A Drive for Education From an Inspiring Mother
